column2:
"Honestly, Lisa isn't a big fan
of teaming up with others,
because sometimes people steal
her kills."

"But! But! Lisa just so happens
to find vicious cutthroat
competition to be quite fun, you
know!"

"It's been a while since Lisa
wanted to do that sort of thing.
So, let's go!"

"This time we're going to...
Volcanic Caverns. Yeah, the
baddies there are strong enough."

"Well well well well!
Let's have some fun, you know?"

"â€»You can not have anyone else other than Lisa accompany you for this Client Order.
To make sure nobody else joins you, you should set a password and choose
Restrict Other Parties in Multi-Party Areas" when accepting the quest."""
